      TextureCoordinate RayHit.tc 
      Methods in cs155.jray that return TextureCoordinate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private TextureCoordinate Cylinder3D.getTextureCoordinate(Point3D p)
      calculate the texture coordinate for the point p on the cylinder.
      Methods in cs155.jray with parameters of type TextureCoordinate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Color3D Texture.getColor(TextureCoordinate tc)
      This returns a Color corresponding to the specified TextureCoordinates
      Color3D ImageTexture.getColor(TextureCoordinate tc)
      This returns a Color corresponding to the pixel whose location in the image is (x,y) after the image is normalized to have size 1.0 x 1.0
      Color3D CheckerTexture.getColor(TextureCoordinate tc)
      This returns a Color corresponding to the pixel whose location in the image is (x,y) where the checkerboard squares have size 100x100

      Generates a RayHit where x,y are the Texture Coordinates
